title: Question 21
prompt:
Men are required to wear all suits and ties, and women should appear in business suits, either pants or skirts.

Which is the best way to write the underlined portion of this sentence? If the original is the best way, choose option (A).
description: Click the <u>one best answer</u> to each question.
feedback:
The problem in this sentence is the placement of the word “all.” When “all” is located before a noun, it modifies that noun. In this case, the sentence means that men must wear every suit and tie—all of them. The writer means that every man is required to wear suits and ties, so the modifier “all” needs to be move before the noun “man.”
All men are required to wear suits and ties, and women should appear in business suits, either pants or skirts.
